attributes.additional_details: Taylor Unit was opened in 1994, for the people of wigan Bolton salford and leigh.  It is a dedicated neurological rehabilitation unit, offering exceptional care.
attributes.background: I am a staff nurse who works on Taylor unit at leigh infirmary. Myself and all the staff are dedicated in the rehabilitation of patients who have suffered head injuries, and other neurological diseases. We have been informed that our unit is to close early next year.
